## Component.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Component` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(props: Props & Partial<BuiltinProps>);
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | <code>Props &amp; Partial&lt;BuiltinProps&gt;</code> |  |
